synopsis.text: Dachima Inaka's "Do You Love Your Mom and Her Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks?" follows the story of Masato Oosuki, an avid gamer and high school student who finds himself trapped in a video game world with his overprotective mother, Mamako. As part of a clandestine government project, Masato is eager to prove his gaming prowess, but his mother's overpowered dual-wielding abilities and constant presence make it difficult for him to shine. Alongside new companions Porta, a charming merchant, and Wise, a philosopher plagued by misfortune, Masato and Mamako embark on an adventure through this fantastical RPG world. Will Masato be able to demonstrate his skills, or will his mother's overwhelming strength steal the spotlight? Join this unlikely party as they navigate the challenges and triumphs of their virtual journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
